mapper.select:
SELECT A.OCCR_DTTM AS OCCR_DTTM, C.LOC_NM AS SCHL_NM, A.STDT_NO AS STDT_NO, DECR(B.STDT_NM) AS STDT_NM, A.LOC_NM AS LOC_NM, A.PLC_CLSS_CD AS PLC_CLSS_CD, A.LAT_VAL AS LAT_VAL, A.LON_VAL AS LON_VAL, A.NEAR_LOC_NO AS NEAR_LOC_NO, A.LOC_NM AS LOC_NM, COALESCE(D.ADDR_BASE,A.LOC_NM) AS ADDR_BASE, DECR(E.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO, G.GUAR_NO AS GUAR_NO, G.GUAR_NM AS GUAR_NM, ABSV.DECR(G.GUAR_TEL_NO) AS GUAR_TEL_NO, A.REG_DT AS REG_DT, A.REG_TM AS REG_TM, A.REG_USER_ID AS REG_USER_ID, A.UPT_DT AS UPT_DT, A.UPT_TM AS UPT_TM, A.UPT_USER_ID AS UPT_USER_ID FROM ABSV.TS_STDT_LOC_HIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TM_STDT_BASE B ON B.STDT_NO = A.STDT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TS_LOC_INFO_BASE C ON C.LOC_NO = B.EORG_LOC_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TS_LOC_INFO_BASE D ON D.LOC_NO = A.NEAR_LOC_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TS_BAND_INFO E ON E.BAND_ID = B.BAND_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TM_STDT_GUAR_CONN F ON F.STDT_NO = B.STDT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TM_GUAR_BASE G ON G.GUAR_NO = F.GUAR_NO WHERE 1=1
and A.OCCR_DTTM between replace(#{entrDtFr},'-','') and replace(#{entrDtTo},'-','') /* 위험감정 일자 */
and A.PLC_CLSS_CD like CONCAT ('%',#{plcClssCd},'%') /* 장소분류 코드 */
and C.LOC_NM like CONCAT ('%',#{locNm},'%') /* 학교명 */
and A.STDT_NO = #{stdtNo}::numeric /* 학생번호 */
and DECR(B.STDT_NM) like CONCAT ('%',#{stdtNm},'%') /* 학생명 */
and G.GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::numeric /* 보호자번호 */
and DECR(G.GUAR_NM) like CONCAT ('%',#{guarNm},'%') /* 보호자명 */
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
